1.text: Deal two players a hand of five cards each.

2.text: Place four piles of cards face down in between the two players.

3.text: Divide the deck in half and create a draw pile of 15 cards for each player.

4.text: Start the game by flipping over the two middle cards.

5.text: Each player should try to place the cards in their hand on the active piles in ascending or descending order.

6.text: Each player should draw from his draw pile whenever he uses a card in his hand to make sure he always has five cards to play.

7.text: If both players can't play any of their cards, then they should both flip over a card from one of the side piles into the center piles.

8.text: When one player runs out of cards in his hand and draw pile, he must slap both piles of cards and say, "Speed!

10.text: Put down more than one card at a time in descending or ascending order.

11.text: Use jokers as a wild card.

12.text: Play with three or four players.

14.text: Split a deck of 52 cards into 2 equal decks.

15.text: Have each player organize his cards into 6 piles into 5 stock piles and 1 spit pile.

16.text: Begin the game by having each player flip a card from his spit pile into the center of the game.

17.text: Each player should place any cards that are face up on one of the center cards that are of ascending or descending value.

18.text: The players should draw from the stock piles if they cannot use any of their cards.

19.text: When a player has played all of the cards in his 5 decks, he should hit the center deck he wants and gain it.

20.text: Reshuffle the two spit piles to continue playing the game.

21.text: Keep playing until one player wins by running out of cards.
